attributes.action: We Should Ensure All Immigrants Are Granted With Visa To Stay In The UK
attributes.additional_details: Due to the pandemic which is currently happening, we should as a nation, help those who are less fortunate and are struggling in this crisis. we can do this by ensuring all immigrants are provided with a UK  visa. As a united nation, we should come together to ensure everyone is protected and given equal rights. Those who are suffering the most in this crisis alongside the vulnerable are the immigrants who can not benefit from the basic needs such as hospitals due to their circumstances.
attributes.background: As leaders of this country, the government should ensure everyone living in the UK is safe especially in this crisis. Therefore it should fall as a compulsory reaction that all immigrants are granted a visa to stay in the UK. Please Sign This petition and show some solidarity for those in need

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Home Office to offer one year visa extensions without applications being made.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310387

Amnesty for UK undocumented immigrants in this COVID-19 World pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998

Create an earned amnesty route for migrants without leave to remain: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301696

Extend rights to access public funds and apply for Indefinite Leave to Remain
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306335
